typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['motorista']) ~> GetDriver
GetDriver select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='mottpmotoid'&&name!='motmotgroid'&&name!='motdt_nascimento'&&name!='motdt_contratacao'&&name!='motibutton'&&name!='motusuoid_inclusao'&&name!='motusuoid_alteracao'&&name!='motusuoid_exclusao'&&name!='motfoto'&&name!='motlatitude'&&name!='motlongitude'&&name!='motgestor_cntoid'&&name!='motidexterno'&&name!='motperfeeoid'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumnsDriver
RemoveColumnsDriver sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SaveStDriver
